Description: Papyrus fragment bearing 5 lines of a Coptic text written along the fibres (recto). EA 75376, 75377, 75378, 75379, 75380, 75381, 75382, 75383, 75384, 75385, 75386, 75387, 75388 are mounted together.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (380723) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/380723)
